tool_description: Generates appropriate responses to comments and messages on social media posts while maintaining brand voice and handling different sentiment types.

comment_text.description: The original comment text to respond to

platform.description: Platform where the comment was posted

brand_voice.description: Brand voice style (professional, casual, humorous, empathetic)

response_type.description: Type of response needed (appreciation, clarification, support, promotional, defensive)

sentiment.description: Detected sentiment of the comment (positive, negative, neutral)

include_emoji.description: Whether to include emojis in the response

escalation_keywords.description: Keywords that should trigger escalation alerts

custom_context.description: Additional context about the original post or situation

auto_respond.description: Whether to automatically post the response or just generate it

response_urgency.description: Response urgency level (low, medium, high, critical)

error_messages: Empty comment: Comment text cannot be empty
Invalid platform: Platform must be one of [facebook, instagram, twitter, linkedin, tiktok, youtube]
Invalid brand voice: Brand voice must be one of [professional, casual, humorous, empathetic]
Invalid response type: Response type must be one of [appreciation, clarification, support, promotional, defensive]
Invalid max length: Length must be between 10 and 500 characters
Invalid sentiment: Sentiment must be one of [positive, negative, neutral]
Escalation triggered: Comment contains escalation keywords and requires manual review
Invalid urgency level: Response urgency must be one of [low, medium, high, critical]
usage: Provide comment_text, platform, brand_voice, and response_type as minimum requirements. Configure additional parameters for more customized responses and automated handling.

confidence_score.description: Confidence score for the generated response (0-100)

response_posted.description: Whether the response was automatically posted
